m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- The shake-up comes as lawyers battle over whether Redstone, 93, is mentally competent to run the multibillion-dollar New York-based media companies Viacom Inc. and CBS Corp. ___ Shanghai Disneyland opens with hopes cash will rain down SHANGHAI (AP) — Walt Disney Co. opened Shanghai Disneyland, its first theme park in mainland China, with a lavish celebration Thursday featuring Communist Party leaders, a children’s choir, Sleeping Beauty and other Disney characters. A vice premier joined Disney CEO Bob Iger in cutting the grand opening’s red ribbon, showing the
